title: Phocuswright Europe
description: Under the motto “Fast Forward”, we visited this year’s Phocuswright Event in Amsterdam. True to this motto, we have seen inspiring keynotes, innovative use cases and were able to make new connections within the travel industry. Camino is something that will bring the industry fast forward. We are certain about it. Follow our journey and become part of the travel industry.

title: Fvw Travel Talk
description: The congress has been the leading specialist congress for German-speaking tourism for more than 20 years. After two virtual events, the B2B event will take place live again. From November 2nd to 5th, 2022, the industry will meet at the Hotel Swandor Topkapi Palace.

title: HIGH 5 Innovation Conference
description: Apaleo brought together hoteliers, innovators, and thought leaders in Munich for the High 5 Innovation Conference. We were also there, represented by our colleagues Anke and Daniel. They had interesting discussions about blockchain’s potential to revolutionize the hospitality industry and, more specifically, how being part of the Camino network can benefit the industry.

title: Avalanche House
description: We are gearing up for the Avalanche House in Brooklyn and are looking forward to interesting keynotes and impactful discussions about web3, traveltech, blockchain technology and much more. The decision to use the robust and versatile Avalanche technology, was the best possible foundation to change the world of travel. We cannot wait to meet other users of the Avalanche ecosystem and to connect and learn from each other. Join the travel revolution!

title: World Aviation Festival
description: We will attend the World Aviation Festival 2022! Let's talk about blockchain technology that can foster new business models and create innovation for all players in the tourism industry. The use cases for global aviation industry in specific are huge and we are looking forward to showing the potential of our highly scalable Camino network that will create a safe and innovative environment for relationships and the trade of travel products B2B and B2C.

title: Phocuswright Conference
description: Phocuswright as the leading authority in travel, tourism and hospitality market research is offering once again with the Phocuswright Conference a valuable platform for innovative companies empowered to tackle the challenges our industry faces. Let’s talk about web3, blockchain technology for the travel industry and how Camino will revolutionize the world of travel. Spot the next big thing before everyone else does and meet us at the Conference in November.

title: HSMAday
description: The Hospitality Sales & Marketing Association Deutschland e.V. consolidates over 1,600 members of the hospitality industry and forms a network of as well as a knowledge pool on all relevant specialist areas. Our Managing Director Daniel Poerschke was there and received overwhelming feedback for his presentation of Chain4Travel’s approach to revolutionize the travel industry.

title: Consensus (by CoinDesk)
description: Consensus is much more than just another crypto festival. CoinDesk brought together roughly 17,000 crypto enthusiasts and experts discussing the regulatory landscape, web3 and the future of digital assets. Vincent Usbeck, Head of Marketing and Sales, was in Austin and looks back on interesting keynotes, inspiring discussions, and an overall extremely future-oriented environment.

title: VIR Online Innovation Days
description: The VIR invited for this years’ Online Innovation Days under the motto “Back to the Future” (“Zurück zur Zukunft”). Even two members of the Chain4Travel team held a keynote speech on the topic of Blockchain and Chain4travels' efforts in providing this technology for the travel industry. The time for change in the travel industry is ripe and the solutions are right there.
outLinkLabel: Watch our keynotes on day two here (YouTube)
